data.title: Detail of World Renouned Auliyaas
data.meta_description: Detail_of_World_Renouned_Auliyaas - Free download as PDF File (.pdf), Text File (.txt) or read online for free. This document provides biographical details about Shah Bahauddin Naqshaband (ral), an influential Sufi saint. It describes his early spiritual training under Sheikh Muhammad Baba as Samasi and Seyyid Amir Kulal. It then recounts two stories - one where Shah Bahauddin has a vision and is granted his wish, and another where his Sheikh tests him by rejecting him at his door on a cold night. The document outlines Shah Bahauddin's spiritual progression under the guidance of these masters of the Naqshbandi Sufi order and their Golden Chain.
